001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.tn3270;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PersistencePort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageMetadata;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.TransactionId;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.io.BlobWriter;
012import java.io.BufferedWriter;
013import java.io.IOException;
014import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
015import java.nio.file.Files;
016import java.nio.file.Path;
017import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
018import java.time.Instant;
019import java.time.ZoneId;
020import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
021
022/**
023 * Writes TN3270 message events into blob/index files compatible with the HTTP sink.
024 * <p>Synchronized to maintain blob/index consistency and optionally delegates non-TN3270 pairs to
025 * another {@link PersistencePort}.</p>
026 */
027public final class Tn3270SegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter implements PersistencePort {
028  private static final DateTimeFormatter STAMP =
029      DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("uuuuMMdd-HHmmss").withZone(ZoneId.systemDefault());
030
031  private final BlobWriter blob;
032  private final BufferedWriter index;
033  private final String blobName;
034  private final String indexName;
035  private final PersistencePort fallback;
036
037  /**
038   * Creates a TN3270 sink that writes blobs and indices under the given directory.
039   *
040   * @param directory destination directory for TN3270 artifacts
041   */
042  public Tn3270SegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(Path directory) {
043    this(directory, null);
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Creates a TN3270 sink that optionally forwards non-TN pairs to a fallback port.
048   *
049   * @param directory destination directory for TN3270 artifacts
050   * @param fallback delegate used for non-TN3270 message pairs (nullable)
051   */
052  public Tn3270SegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(Path directory, PersistencePort fallback) {
053    try {
054      Files.createDirectories(directory);
055      String stamp = STAMP.format(Instant.now());
056      this.blobName = "blob-tn-" + stamp + ".seg";
057      this.indexName = "index-tn-" + stamp + ".ndjson";
058      this.blob = new BlobWriter(directory.resolve(blobName));
059      this.index = Files.newBufferedWriter(
060          directory.resolve(indexName),
061          StandardCharsets.UTF_8,
062          StandardOpenOption.CREATE,
063          StandardOpenOption.APPEND);
064      this.fallback = fallback;
065    } catch (IOException e) {
066      throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to initialize TN3270 segment sink", e);
067    }
068  }
069
070  @Override
071  public synchronized void persist(MessagePair pair) throws Exception {
072    if (pair == null) {
073      return;
074    }
075    boolean handled = false;
076    if (isTn(pair.request())) {
077      writeEvent(pair.request(), "REQ");
078      handled = true;
079    }
080    if (isTn(pair.response())) {
081      writeEvent(pair.response(), "RSP");
082      handled = true;
083    }
084    if (!handled && fallback != null) {
085      fallback.persist(pair);
086    }
087  }
088
089  private static boolean isTn(MessageEvent event) {
090    return event != null && event.protocol() == ProtocolId.TN3270 && event.payload() != null;
091  }
092
093  private void writeEvent(MessageEvent event, String kind) throws Exception {
094    ByteStream stream = event.payload();
095    byte[] data = stream.data();
096    FiveTuple flow = stream.flow();
097    String src = endpoint(flow, stream.fromClient());
098    String dst = endpoint(flow, !stream.fromClient());
099
100    MessageMetadata metadata = event.metadata() != null ? event.metadata() : MessageMetadata.empty();
101    String transactionId = metadata.transactionId() != null && !metadata.transactionId().isBlank()
102        ? metadata.transactionId()
103        : TransactionId.newId();
104
105    long bodyOffset = blob.position();
106    if (data.length > 0) {
107      blob.write(data, 0, data.length);
108    }
109    long bodyLength = blob.position() - bodyOffset;
110
111    String firstLine = preview(data);
112
113    StringBuilder json = new StringBuilder(160)
114        .append('{')
115        .append("\"ts_first\":").append(stream.timestampMicros()).append(',')
116        .append("\"ts_last\":").append(stream.timestampMicros()).append(',')
117        .append("\"id\":\"").append(escape(transactionId)).append("\",")
118        .append("\"kind\":\"").append(kind).append("\",")
119        .append("\"src\":\"").append(escape(src)).append("\",")
120        .append("\"dst\":\"").append(escape(dst)).append("\",")
121        .append("\"first_line\":\"").append(firstLine).append("\",")
122        .append("\"headers_blob\":\"").append(blobName).append("\",")
123        .append("\"headers_off\":").append(bodyOffset).append(',')
124        .append("\"headers_len\":0,")
125        .append("\"body_blob\":\"").append(blobName).append("\",")
126        .append("\"body_off\":").append(bodyOffset).append(',')
127        .append("\"body_len\":").append(bodyLength)
128        .append('}');
129
130    index.write(json.toString());
131    index.newLine();
132    index.flush();
133    blob.flush(false);
134  }
135
136  private static String endpoint(FiveTuple flow, boolean fromClient) {
137    return fromClient ? flow.srcIp() + ':' + flow.srcPort() : flow.dstIp() + ':' + flow.dstPort();
138  }
139
140  private static String preview(byte[] data) {
141    if (data == null || data.length == 0) {
142      return "";
143    }
144    int len = Math.min(data.length, 16);
145    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(len * 2 + (data.length > len ? 3 : 0));
146    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
147      int b = data[i] & 0xFF;
148      sb.append(Character.forDigit((b >>> 4) & 0xF, 16));
149      sb.append(Character.forDigit(b & 0xF, 16));
150    }
151    if (data.length > len) {
152      sb.append("...");
153    }
154    return sb.toString();
155  }
156
157  private static String escape(String value) {
158    if (value == null || value.isEmpty()) {
159      return "";
160    }
161    StringBuilder out = new StringBuilder(value.length() + 8);
162    for (int i = 0; i < value.length(); i++) {
163      char c = value.charAt(i);
164      switch (c) {
165        case '"', '\\' -> out.append('\\').append(c);
166        case '\n' -> out.append("\\n");
167        case '\r' -> out.append("\\r");
168        case '\t' -> out.append("\\t");
169        default -> {
170          if (c < 0x20) {
171            out.append(' ');
172          } else {
173            out.append(c);
174          }
175        }
176      }
177    }
178    return out.toString();
179  }
180
181  @Override
182  public synchronized void close() throws Exception {
183    try {
184      index.flush();
185    } finally {
186      try {
187        index.close();
188      } finally {
189        blob.close();
190        if (fallback != null) {
191          fallback.close();
192        }
193      }
194    }
195  }
196}
